name: The Block
title: Utf8b8jutw Us House Oversight Committee Probes
text:
Synopsis
The U.S. House Oversight Committee is investigating alleged "debanking" in the crypto industry, signaling potential regulatory scrutiny and challenges for crypto firms' banking relationships.

Key Insights
- The House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform has reached out to CEOs of Coinbase, Kraken, and Uniswap Labs to investigate alleged debanking in the crypto industry
- Crypto firms have faced significant challenges maintaining banking relationships, especially after FTX's collapse in late 2022
- Allegations of a coordinated crackdown dubbed "Operation Choke Point 2.0" are drawing comparisons to a previous Obama-era initiative targeting high-risk industries
- Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) is closing its UK office to focus on crypto developments in the United States
- The European Central Bank is pushing for a digital euro in response to Trump's executive order promoting dollar-backed stablecoins
- Solana-based stablecoin supply has surpassed $10 billion, with USDC accounting for nearly 80% of the supply
- Fogo Foundation raised $8 million for a new Solana Virtual Machine-based blockchain, targeting high-speed, low-cost transaction processing
